import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link} from "react-router-dom"; import postService from '../services/post.service'; const ProfileComponent = ({ match, location }) => { const [currentUser, setUser] = useState(""); const [posts, setPosts] = useState(); useEffect(() => { postService.getAllPost().then((response) => { setPosts(response) }) }) const deletePost = (_id) => { postService.deletePost(_id).then((response) => { alert("Post Deleted Successfully") }) } const { username } = useParams(); return (
